Parameters: int: The updated peer video quality. Valid values: @B_android#telecom#VideoProfile#QUALITY_HIGH_E@, @B_android#telecom#VideoProfile#QUALITY_MEDIUM_E@, @B_android#telecom#VideoProfile#QUALITY_LOW_E@, @B_android#telecom#VideoProfile#QUALITY_DEFAULT_E@.
onVideoQualityChanged(int).Description: Handles a change to the video quality. Callback originates from @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider#changeVideoQuality_E@.

onSessionModifyRequestReceived(android.t.Description: Called when the @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider_E@ receives a session modification request from the peer device. The @B_android#telecom#InCallService_E@ may potentially prompt the user to confirm whether they wish to accept the request, or decide to automatically accept the request. In either case the @B_android#telecom#InCallService_E@ should call @B_android#telecom#InCallService#VideoCall#sendSessionModifyResponse_E@ to indicate the video profile agreed upon. Callback originates from @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider#receiveSessionModifyRequest_E@.

onCameraCapabilitiesChanged(android.tele.Description: Handles a change in the capabilities of the currently selected camera. Used by the @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider_E@ in response to @B_android#telecom#InCallService#VideoCall#requestCameraCapabilities_E@. The @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider_E@ may also report the camera capabilities after a call to @B_android#telecom#InCallService#VideoCall#setCamera_E@. Callback originates from @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider#changeCameraCapabilities_E@.

Parameters: int: The updated peer video width.
int: The updated peer video height.
onPeerDimensionsChanged(int,int).Description: Handles a change to the video dimensions from the peer device. This could happen if, for example, the peer changes orientation of their device, or switches cameras. Callback originates from @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider#changePeerDimensions_E@.
onPeerDimensionsChanged(int,int).FullName: public abstract void onPeerDimensionsChanged (int width, int height)

Parameters: int: Status of the session modify request. Valid values are @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider#SESSION_MODIFY_REQUEST_SUCCESS_E@, @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider#SESSION_MODIFY_REQUEST_FAIL_E@, @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider#SESSION_MODIFY_REQUEST_INVALID_E@, @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider#SESSION_MODIFY_REQUEST_TIMED_OUT_E@, @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider#SESSION_MODIFY_REQUEST_REJECTED_BY_REMOTE_E@.
VideoProfile: The original request which was sent to the peer device.
VideoProfile: The actual profile changes made by the peer device.
onSessionModifyResponseReceived(int,andr.Description: Called when the @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider_E@ receives a response to a session modification request previously sent to the peer device. The new video state should not be considered active by the @B_android#telecom#InCallService_E@ until the @B_android#telecom#Call_E@ video state changes (the @B_android#telecom#Call#Callback#onDetailsChanged_E@ callback is triggered when the video state changes). Callback originates from @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider#receiveSessionModifyResponse_E@.
onSessionModifyResponseReceived(int,andr.FullName: public abstract void onSessionModifyResponseReceived (int status, VideoProfile requestedProfile, VideoProfile responseProfile)

Parameters: long: The updated data usage (in bytes).
onCallDataUsageChanged(long).Description: Handles an update to the total data used for the current video session. Used by the @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider_E@ in response to @B_android#telecom#InCallService#VideoCall#requestCallDataUsage_E@. May also be called periodically by the @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider_E@. Callback originates from @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider#setCallDataUsage_E@.

Parameters: int: The updated peer video width.
int: The updated peer video height.
onPeerDimensionsChanged(int, int).Description: Handles a change to the video dimensions from the peer device. This could happen if, for example, the peer changes orientation of their device, or switches cameras. Callback originates from @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider#changePeerDimensions_E@.
onPeerDimensionsChanged(int, int).FullName: public abstract void onPeerDimensionsChanged (int width, int height)

Parameters: int: The event. Valid values are: @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider#SESSION_EVENT_RX_PAUSE_E@, @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider#SESSION_EVENT_RX_RESUME_E@, @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider#SESSION_EVENT_TX_START_E@, @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider#SESSION_EVENT_TX_STOP_E@, @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider#SESSION_EVENT_CAMERA_FAILURE_E@, @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider#SESSION_EVENT_CAMERA_READY_E@, @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider#SESSION_EVENT_CAMERA_PERMISSION_ERROR_E@.
onCallSessionEvent(int).Description: Handles events related to the current video session which the @B_android#telecom#InCallService_E@ may wish to handle. These are separate from requested changes to the session due to the underlying protocol or connection. Callback originates from @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider#handleCallSessionEvent_E@.

ClassDesc: The @B_android#telecom#InCallService_E@ extends this class to provide a means of receiving callbacks from the @B_android#telecom#Connection#VideoProvider_E@. When the @B_android#telecom#InCallService_E@ receives the @B_android#telecom#Call#Callback#onVideoCallChanged_E@ callback, it should create an instance its @B_android#telecom#InCallService#VideoCall#Callback_E@ implementation and set it on the @B_android#telecom#InCallService#VideoCall_E@ using @B_android#telecom#InCallService#VideoCall#registerCallback_E@.
